pages.text: Fanshi wo suo ting yong de jing wen huo shi ren wangji de jing wen, wo jiang yong bi ta geng hao de jing wen huo yu ta xiangsi de jing wen lai daiti. Nandao ni bu zhidao an la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de ma?
Nandao ni bu zhidao an la yongyou tiandi de zhuquan ma? Chu an la wai, nimen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.

Nandao nimen yao xiang yiqian youren wen mu sa nayang [ru: Rang women qinyan kanjian women de zhu ba!] Wen nimen de shizhe [mu sheng] ma? Shei yi xinyang huanqu bu xinyang [mi wu], shei que yi mishi zheng dao.

You jing ren zhong you xuduo ren, zai zhenli [muhanmode shi an la de shizhe] dui tamen xianming hou, youyu neixin jidu, tamen xiwang nimen chengwei xinshi hou you ba nimen bian cheng buxinyang zhe. Yinci, zai an la de mingling jianglin qian, nimen dang yuanliang tamen, dang kuanshu tamen. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.

Nimen dang jin shou bai gong [zhu], wan na tian ke. Fanshi nimen wei ziji suo zuo de [an la xiyue de] shangong, nimen jiang zai an la nali jian qi huibao. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi quan shi de.

Tamen shuo:“Chu youtai jiaotu huo jidu jiaotu wai, qita ren dou jin buliao leyuan.” Zhe shi tamen de wangxiang. Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba! Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
Xuzhi, shei chedi guishun an la qie shi xingshan zhe, shei zai ta de zhu nali jiang huode ta de baochou. Kongju bu hui jianglin tamen, tamen ye bu youchou [zhu].
